import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./ItemQuestion.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import moment from "moment"; function ItemQuestion({ question: { id, title, category_question_id, content, tag_id, user_id, views_couter, comments_couter, votes_couter, created_at, }, }) { return ( <>
{votes_couter}

votes

{comments_couter}

answers

{views_couter}

views

{title}

{tags_i}

{item.category_question.name} {item.user.username} asked {moment(item.created_at).fromNow(true)} ago
); } export default ItemQuestion;
